attributes.action: Supply prison officers and prisoner escorting staff with stab proof vests in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the Government supply all Prison Officers and Prisoner Escorts with stab proof vests to protect them while on duty.
Often these staff are working in insecure areas of hospitals and attending funerals where members of the public are. These staff often escort High Profile Prisoners with no form of protection
